portfolio.title: Gadget Galore
portfolio.description: It is a full-featured E-commerece shopping website with Payment gateway. For managing the entire content of app using Sanity, which  allows us to focus on developing the application without having to worry about the content, file storage, and databases

portfolio.title: Netflix App
portfolio.description: Movie info application built with vanilla JavaScript with TMDB API. This includes the most popular movies and TV shows with detail pages, a search box for movies and shows with full pagination and a slider for movies that are currently playing in theaters.

portfolio.title: Gym Fintess App
portfolio.description: Created Gym Fitness App using React, MaterialUI, RapidAPI . Using different properites of materialui like box, stack and Typography and using rapidapi in order to get all those exercise data and youtube videos data as well.

portfolio.title: React Portfolio
portfolio.description: Created Personal portfolio using React . Portfolio have many sections like about me, skills i have and projects with github repo links and hosting links as well.It also contains contact forms and links of social media accounts as well.

portfolio.title: Sentiment Analysis In Gujarati Language
portfolio.description: Created a Gujarati Language dataset(GDSA) with the help of tweepy libraries and also created a stopwords dictionary and a dictionary for positive as well as negative words which is used in classification algorithms to perform sentiment analysis in Gujarati language.
